law.catch_line: An applicant for a wholesaler's license shall:...

section.section:
An applicant for a wholesaler's license shall:
submit to the agency an application on the form that the agency provides; and
subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection, pay to the agency an annual fee of $500.
The county commissioners shall waive the annual fee for a volunteer fire company or a volunteer rescue company.

text.section: The agency shall credit license fees collected under subsection (a)(1)(ii) of this section to the general fund of the county.
